description:
A super-thick fleece for mountain cabins, bouldering grottos and chilly patios. Elbow patches protect from wear and tear in a high friction spots, so it will last through many seasons of adventures.

  • Made of deep-pile 300-weight Sherpa fleece
  • Reverse-coil zip won't snag fabrics
  • Kangaroo pocket with side zips
  • Elbow patches add durability
  • Elastic binding on hood and cuffs seals in heat
  • Hem cinch-cord
  • Relaxed fit
name: The North Face Campshire Pullover Hoodie 2.0 - Women's
